dcterms:creator: M. Kerzel
S. Wermter
dcterms:description: The dataset is generated by performing random motor babbling to direct the gaze towards a visual stimulus, capturing the centroid of the detected target in the image plane.
dcterms:title: Gaze dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Kerzel
S. Wermter
dcterms:description: This dataset is collected by performing random motor babbling on the joints of NICO's right arm, capturing the hand's current position in Cartesian space and the current motor joint values.
dcterms:title: Arm dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Kerzel
S. Wermter
dcterms:description: The eye-hand dataset is recorded by moving the arm randomly within the reachable workspace and using gaze control to locate the hand visually.
dcterms:title: Eye-hand dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Kerzel
S. Wermter
dcterms:description: This dataset is generated to test the model's capability to react to environmental changes, specifically simulating a mechanical change in NICO's body.
dcterms:title: Environmental change dataset
